This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1000 Sq.
Ft.
Gloria Park Villas brings you to the hub of a thriving community and exceptional living.
Our Las Vegas apartments are enhanced by endless local attractions and the ideal arrangement of personal, and community amenities.
We offer floor plans that are complete with stunning features, and highlights.
Our apartments in Las Vegas feature gourmet kitchens with granite countertops, a private patio, spacious walk-in closets, window coverings, and more.
Within our community, you can discover beautiful landscaping, swimming pools, a movie theatre, covered parking, extra storage, and more.
Our spectacular Las Vegas oasis is nestled near many local attractions, restaurants, grocery stores, and everything that you need to feel right at home.
Find yourself jumping into a lifestyle that is full of simplicity, and luxury.
Come home to Gloria Park Villas today.
Features:

Vaulted Ceilings*, High Speed Internet Access, Ceiling Fans, Air Conditioning, Water Saving Faucets, Full-Sized Washer/Dryer, Pet Friendly, Energy Efficient Thermostat, Fully Equipped Kitchen, Spacious Floor Plans, Fireplace*, Granite Counter tops
* Select Units Only
Community Amenities:

Courtyards, BBQ and Picnic Areas, Assigned Covered Parking, TV Lounge, Gated Community, Movie Theater, Club House, On Site Maintenance Team, Swimming Pools with Spa, 24 Hour Fitness Center, Private Garages
Pet Policy
Cats & Dogs only, maximum 2 pets per apartment.
Dog 35 lb.
weight limit fully grown.
Breed restrictions apply, non-aggressive breeds only.
$300.00 Non-refundable pet fee plus $35.00 monthly pet rent for 1 pet.
$400.00 Non-refundable pet fee plus $50.00 monthly pet rent 2 pets.
Income Requirements:
3 times the amount of rent, total household gross income.
